entry.g:title: Samsung QN65Q9FN - 65" QLED Smart TV - 4K Ultra HD
entry.g:description: The Samsung QN65Q9FN is a cutting-edge smart TV with a stunning 65" QLED display, offering breathtaking 4K Ultra HD resolution. Enjoy immersive viewing experiences and access to a world of online entertainment.

entry.g:title: Sony XBR55A8H - 55" OLED TV - 4K Ultra HD
entry.g:description: The Sony XBR55A8H is a premium OLED TV with a sleek design and outstanding 4K Ultra HD picture quality. Experience vibrant colors, deep blacks, and impressive contrast for a truly cinematic viewing experience.
